    • com.blade中Blade的使用

      返回Blade的com.blade中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Blade Blade.addRoutePackage(String packageName)
      Setting route package，e.g：com.baldejava.route Can be introduced into multiple packages, all of which are in the package.
      Blade Blade.addRoutePackages(String... packages)
      Setting route package，e.g：com.baldejava.route Can be introduced into multiple packages, all of which are in the package.
      Blade Blade.after(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register a after routing request interceptor
      Blade Blade.all(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register for any request routing
      Blade Blade.any(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register for any request routing
      Blade Blade.app(Bootstrap bootstrap)
      Dynamically set the global initialization class, the embedded Jetty boot
      Blade Blade.app(Class<? extends Bootstrap> bootstrap)
      Dynamically set global initialization class
      Blade Blade.basePackage(String basePackage) 
      Blade Blade.before(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register a pre routing request interceptor
      Blade Blade.container(Ioc ioc)
      Setting a ioc container
      Blade Blade.delete(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register a DELETE request route
      Blade Blade.enableServer(boolean enableServer) 
      Blade Blade.enableXSS(boolean httpXss)
      Setting XSS is enable
      Blade Blade.get(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register a GET request route
      Blade Blade.interceptor(String packageName)
      Setting the path where the interceptor, e.g:com.bladejava.interceptor
      Blade Blade.ioc(String... packages)
      Setting Ioc packages, e.g:com.bladejava.service
      Blade Blade.isDev(boolean isDev)
      Setting blade run mode
      Blade Blade.listen(int port)
      Setting jetty listen port
      Blade Blade.loadAppConf(String confName)
      Setting Properties configuration file File path based on classpath
      static Blade Blade.me() 
      static Blade Blade.me(String appConf) 
      Blade Blade.plugin(Class<? extends Plugin> plugin)
      return register plugin object
      Blade Blade.post(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register a POST request route
      Blade Blade.put(String path, RouteHandler handler)
      Register a PUT request route
      Blade Blade.route(String path, Class<?> clazz, String method)
      Add a route
      Blade Blade.route(String path, Class<?> clazz, String method, HttpMethod httpMethod)
      Register a functional route
      Blade Blade.routeConf(String basePackage)
      Registration of a configuration file, e.g: "com.xxx.route","route.conf"
      Blade Blade.routeConf(String basePackage, String conf)
      Registration of a configuration file, e.g: "com.xxx.route","route.conf"
      Blade Blade.routes(List<Route> routes)
      Add a route list
      Blade Blade.staticFolder(String... folders)
      Setting the frame static file folder
      Blade Blade.view404(String view404)
      Setting 404 view page
      Blade Blade.view500(String view500)
      Setting 500 view page
      Blade Blade.viewEngin(TemplateEngine templateEngine)
      Setting Render Engin, Default is JspRender
      Blade Blade.webRoot(String webRoot)
      Setting blade web root path
      参数类型为Blade的com.blade中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
